subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Women
lead_paragraph: Hasheem Thabeet led a balanced attack with 15 points and 8 rebounds Saturday, and No. 2 Connecticut snapped back from its first loss of the season with a 80-49 victory against visiting Rutgers.
snippet: Hasheem Thabeet led a balanced attack with 15 points and 8 rebounds Saturday, and No. 2 Connecticut snapped back from its first loss of the season with a 80-49 victory against visiting Rutgers.
